Father, in the name of Jesus Christ, our great High Priest and Advocate, we beseech thy mercy for HEARER_SAINT!
Holy Father, we come boldly before thy throne of grace by the blood of Jesus, on behalf of our brother, HEARER_FIRST!
Father in heaven, hallowed by thy name! Let us find grace in thy sight, as we pray for our dear HEARER_SAINT!
Heavenly Father, hear our prayer for HEARER_SAINT; for we come unto thee as little children, in the name of thy holy child, Jesus.
